languages.text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.
languages.original_text: Наносит (от {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} до {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) урона всем целям на линии и накладывает эффект "ожог души". Ожог души: Цель получает {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} урона в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В конце своего хода цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае успеха эффект будет снят. Под действием эффекта дополнительный урон во время {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} получают псайкеры, когда используют {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, и демоны, когда атакуют или используют психосилы.

traits.locale_text: Deals (from 3 to 10)+(WP bonus) damage to all targets in line and grants them Soul Burn effect. Soul Burn: Target suffers (from 1 to 3)+(Navigator's WP Bonus) damage at the start of their turn. At the end of their turn they must pass a Willpower test to remove the flames. When burning, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use psychic powers, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

Deals ((from 3 to 10) + WP bonus) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: target suffers ((from 1 to 3) + Navigator's WP Bonus) damage at the start of their turn. At the end of their turn, they must pass a Willpower test to remove the flames. When burning, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use psychic powers, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

Deals {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. Soul Burn: target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

languages.text: Наносит (от {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} до {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) урона всем целям на линии и накладывает эффект "ожог души". Ожог души: Цель получает {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} урона в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В конце своего хода цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае успеха эффект будет снят. Под действием эффекта дополнительный урон во время {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} получают псайкеры, когда используют {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, и демоны, когда атакуют или используют психосилы.
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: Наносит ((от 3 до 10) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ) урона всем целям на линии и накладывает эффект "ожог души". Ожог души: цель получает ((от 1 до 3) + бонус ВОЛ навигатора) урона в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В конце своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Воли. В случае успеха эффект будет снят. Под действием эффекта дополнительный урон во время горения получают псайкеры, когда используют психосилы, и демоны, когда атакуют или используют психосилы.

Наносит ((от 3 до 10) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ) урона всем целям на линии и накладывает эффект "ожог души". Ожог души: цель получает ((от 1 до 3) + бонус ВОЛ навигатора) урона в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В конце своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Воли. В случае успеха эффект будет снят. Под действием эффекта дополнительный урон во время горения получают псайкеры, когда используют психосилы, и демоны, когда атакуют или используют психосилы.

Наносит {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} урона всем целям на линии и накладывает эффект "ожог души". Ожог души: цель получает {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} урона в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В конце своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Воли. В случае успеха эффект будет снят. Под действием эффекта дополнительный урон во время горения получают псайкеры, когда используют психосилы, и демоны, когда атакуют или используют психосилы.

languages.text: 对直线上所有目标造成{uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点伤害，并施加灵魂燃烧效果。 灵魂燃烧： 目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点伤害。回合结束时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}才能扑灭火焰。 处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态的灵能者每次使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时都会受到额外伤害。处于燃烧状态的恶魔每次攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，都会受到额外伤害。
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: 对直线上所有目标造成{uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并施加灵魂燃烧效果。 灵魂燃烧： 目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点伤害。回合结束时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能扑灭火焰。 处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态的灵能者每次使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时都会受到额外伤害。处于燃烧状态的恶魔每次攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}时，都会受到额外伤害。

对直线上所有目标造成{uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点伤害，并造成灵魂燃烧效果。 灵魂燃烧： 目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}点伤害。回合结束时，受影响的目标必须通过意志{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能扑灭火焰。 处于燃烧状态的灵能者每次使用灵能时都会受到额外伤害，而处于燃烧状态的恶魔每次攻击或使用灵能时，都会受到额外伤害。

languages.text: Inflige (de {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} a {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) de daño a todos los objetivos situados en una línea recta y les causa el efecto quemadura del alma. Quemadura del alma: El objetivo sufre {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} de daño al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al final de su turno, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para extinguir las llamas. Mientras estén {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g}, los psíquicos sufren daños adicionales cada vez que utilizan sus {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, y los daemons los sufren cada vez que ataquen o utilicen poderes psíquicos.
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: Inflige (de {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} a {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) de daño a todos los objetivos situados en una línea recta y les causa el efecto quemadura del alma. Quemadura del alma: El objetivo sufre {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} de daño al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al final de su turno, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para extinguir las llamas. Mientras estén {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g}, los psíquicos sufren daños adicionales cada vez que utilizan sus {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, y los daemons los sufren cada vez que ataquen o utilicen poderes psíquicos.

Inflige {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} de daño a todos los objetivos situados en una línea recta y les causa el efecto quemadura del alma. Quemadura del alma: El objetivo sufre {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} de daño al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al final de su turno, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Voluntad para extinguir las llamas. Mientras estén ardiendo, los psíquicos sufren daños adicionales cada vez que utilizan sus poderes psíquicos, y los daemons los sufren cada vez que ataquen o utilicen poderes psíquicos.

languages.text: Verursacht (von {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} bis {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) Schaden bei allen Zielen in einer Reihe und fügt den Effekt Seelenbrand zu. Seelenbrand: Das Ziel erleidet {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} Schaden zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Am Ende seines Zuges muss er eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Probe{/g} schaffen, um die Flammen zu entfernen. Wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennen{/g}, erleiden Psioniker jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} einsetzen; Dämonen erleiden jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie angreifen oder psionische Kräfte einsetzen.
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bei allen Zielen in einer Reihe und fügt den Effekt Seelenbrand zu. Seelenbrand: Das Ziel erleidet zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} Schaden. Am Ende seines Zugs muss er eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestehen, um die Flammen zu entfernen. Wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennen{/g}, erleiden Psioniker jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} einsetzen; Dämonen erleiden jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie angreifen oder {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} einsetzen.

Verursacht {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} Schaden bei allen Zielen in einer Reihe und fügt den Effekt Seelenbrand zu. Seelenbrand: Das Ziel erleidet {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} Schaden zu Beginn seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}. Am Ende seiner Runde muss er eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Willenskraftprobe{/g} schaffen, um die Flammen zu entfernen. Wenn sie brennen, erleiden Psioniker jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie psionische Kräfte einsetzen; Dämonen erleiden jedes Mal zusätzlichen Schaden, wenn sie angreifen oder psionische Kräfte einsetzen.

languages.text: Inflige (de {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} à {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) points de dégâts à toutes les cibles sur une ligne et applique l'effet Brûlure de l'âme. Brûlure de l'âme : La cible subit {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} points de dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. À la fin de son tour, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} pour éteindre les flammes. Les psykers victimes de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils utilisent des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, tandis que les démons subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ou utilisent des pouvoirs psychiques.
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: Inflige (de {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} à {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) points de dégâts à toutes les cibles sur une ligne et applique l'effet Brûlure de l'âme. Brûlure de l'âme : La cible subit {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} points de dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. À la fin de son tour, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} pour éteindre les flammes. Les psykers victimes de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils utilisent des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, tandis que les démons subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ou utilisent des pouvoirs psychiques.

Inflige {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} points de dégâts à toutes les cibles alignées et applique l'effet Brûlure de l'âme. Brûlure de l'âme : La cible subit {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} points de dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. À la fin de son tour, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Volonté pour échapper aux flammes. Lorsqu'ils se consument, les psykers subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils utilisent des pouvoirs psychiques. De même, les démons subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ou utilisent des pouvoirs psychiques.

Inflige (de {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} à {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) points de dégâts à toutes les cibles sur une ligne et applique l'effet Brûlure de l'âme. Brûlure de l'âme : La cible subit {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} points de dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. À la fin de son tour, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} pour éteindre les flammes. Les psykers victimes de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils utilisent des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, tandis que les démons subissent des dégâts supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ou utilisent des pouvoirs psychiques.

languages.text: すべての対象に ({uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}～{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) のダメージを与え、ソウルバーン効果を付与する。 ソウルバーン： ターゲットは自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}ダメージを受ける。ターンの終了時に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しない限り、炎は消えない。 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}している際、異能者は毎回{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うたびに追加ダメージを受ける。ディーモンは―毎回アタックする度またはサイキック・パワーを使うたびとなる。
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: すべての対象に ({uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}～{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) のダメージを与え、ソウルバーン効果を付与する。 ソウルバーン： ターゲットは自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}ダメージを受ける。ターンの終了時に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しない限り、炎は消えない。 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}している際、異能者は毎回{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うたびに追加ダメージを受ける。ディーモンは―毎回アタックする度またはサイキック・パワーを使うたびとなる。

直線上および「ソウルバーン」効果を受けているすべてのターゲットに{uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}-{uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}のダメージを与える。 ソウルバーン： ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に{uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}のダメージを受ける。そのターン終了時、意志力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば炎を取り除ける。 炎上中、異能者は超能力を使用するたびに追加ダメージを受ける。また、ディーモンは攻撃や超能力の使用で追加ダメージを受ける。

languages.text: Düz bir çizgide bulunan tüm hedeflere ({uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} ila {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) kadar hasar verir ve ruh yanığı etkisi oluşturur. Ruh Yanığı: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} hasara maruz kalır. Turunun sonunda alevlerden kurtulabilmek için bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanarken{/g} ruhsezerler her {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandıklarında, iblisler de saldırdıklarında veya ruhsezi gücü kullandıklarında ilave hasara maruz kalırlar.
languages.original_text: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) damage to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: The target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use psychic powers.
